Message.Title: Hey: Liberals tell us. Why does Obama hate sweet little babies? We know God loves them why don't You?
Message.Msg: Hey: Liberals tell us. Why does Obama hate sweet little babies? President Obama, therefore, must consider abortion a most pressing issue that must not only be legal, but funded here and abroad with taxpayer money regardless of where the public stands on the issue. According to Obama, “We must stay united in our determination to prevent unintended pregnancies, support pregnant women and mothers, reduce the need for abortion, encourage healthy relationships, and promote adoption.” I would be the first to shout amen at that speech if only his actions met his words. How exactly does funding abortion reduce the need for it? If our welfare state taught us anything, it is that subsidizing something does not reduce the need for it. On the contrary, it propagates dependency.

Topic.Title: Joe Bidens Tax Payer Paid $500,000 a Nite Hotel Room in Paris. Democrats Fleecing the Taxpayer daily

Each minimum wage democrat 'worker' would earn about $9600 per year. So $500,000 divided by $9600 = 52 minimum wage workers paid for an entire year.
